text: Pedaparupudi is a village in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the mandal headquarters of Pedaparupudi mandal in Gudivada Revenue Division. == Demographics == Census of India, the town had a population of . The total population constitute, males, females and children, in the age group of 0–6 years. The average literacy rate stands at 79.34% with literates, significantly higher than the national average of 73.00%. == See also == *Villages in Pedaparupudi mandal ==References== Category:Villages in Krishna district Category:Mandal headquarters in Krishna district
title: Pedaparupudi
